## RowSelectorOptions interface

Row selector options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RowSelectorOptions<TSelectedData = any, TData = any, TId = any> extends PluginOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoResetOnDataChange](./grid.rowselectoroptions.autoresetondatachange.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether selected data should be reset when displayed data change |
|  [getRowData](./grid.rowselectoroptions.getrowdata.md) | <code>(data: TData) =&gt; TSelectedData</code> | Method which if is not specified uses getRowId, but normaly can store specific data for selected rows |
|  [getRowId](./grid.rowselectoroptions.getrowid.md) | <code>(data: TData) =&gt; TId</code> | Method used for obtaining row id, without this row selector cant work |
|  [multiSelection](./grid.rowselectoroptions.multiselection.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether row selection is enabled |
